posts.post_content:
FS:  Raw T206 Detroit Tigers  *** ALL SOLD ***

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Assorted raw Detroit Tigers T206 cards.  Nearly all of these cards are crease-free, with few (if any) marks.  Just honest corner wear.

Bush, Owen (Donie)  . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . $ 35.00    *** SOLD ***
Donovan, William (Throwing) . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . $ 35.00    *** SOLD ***
Killian, Edward (Throwing)  . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . $ 40.00    *** SOLD *** 
Mullin, George (Batting) - Polar Bear back . . . . . . . . $ 45.00    *** SOLD ***    
O'Leary, Charlie (Portrait)  . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . $ 35.00    *** SOLD ***
Schmidt, Charles (Throwing)  . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . $ 35.00    *** SOLD ***    
Summers, Oren (scuff marks)  . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . $ 25.00    *** SOLD ***    

Orders totaling $100 or more, ship free. 

All other orders, please add $5.00 towards shipping via USPS Priority Mail.

I would prefer payment via Paypal Family & Friends, but would accept check or money order (which must clear before I ship).

First person to contact me stating which card(s) they will take, and pays, gets it/them. 

You will get the exact card(s) pictured.

Please note:  I will not accept returns nor issue refunds.  Recorded packaging of cards for delivery is done with help of postal worker.

Thanks
Vincent
I will take Killian and Schmidt
Hi friends - this looks like it took 70 minutes to unload 7 decent looking “raw” cards. Is that about right for the board?

[quote name="Kevin" post=2028181]Hi friends - this looks like it took 70 minutes to unload 7 decent looking “raw” cards. Is that about right for the board?[/QUOTE]

Cards have been selling very fast of late. I’ve missed out on 3 cards just this week that sold within 30 minutes of being posted. VG raw singles sell very very quickly though.

posts.post_title: I have shared my thoughs before about value of leaving prices listed for items sold
posts.post_content:
I have to give credit to where credit is due, and that is to the Net54 Old Cardboard members whom previously sold items (in this case raw T206 cards) and left their asking prices listed.  I used those listings as a reference guide to determine what current, fair selling prices are for comparable condition cards.  I wish more/all members would do the same.  It is a very helpful service to members such as myself that have been out; of leaving asking prices of sold items in their listings.  It is a valuable and helpful service to individuals such as myself, whom have been out of the mainstream vintage card collecting hobby for years, and knowing pricing has changed over that time.  Just as easy to slap a "SOLD" label next to the asking price as it is to replace the price with "SOLD". 

Thank you to all whom reviewed and/or had interest in my items.

This!!!

Agree 100%. 
Thanks.

This was my first transaction here.  I am enjoying the boards immensely and realize there is so much to learn.  We've been collecting since the early 80s.  In and out of collecting.  

But wow, I cannot believe the ease of this transaction.  Thank you so much and thanks for letting me be part of the community.

It has been a pleasure doing business with you, and the other Net54 Old Cardboard members.

All cards have been shipped out via USPS Priority Mail, as of 2:52PM today.  Slight delay on shipping one order due to PayPal initiated review.

Thanks again for the business.
Vincent - I regret not pulling the trigger on a few more of these the other day.  Ed Summers is in his temporary home here before he gets placed in the T206 location.  Thanks so much, friend...
